name: TransitionEvent.pseudoElement
description: The TransitionEvent.pseudoElement read-only property is a DOMString, starting with '::', containing the name of the pseudo-element the animation runs on. If the transition doesn't run on a pseudo-element but on the element, an empty string: ''.

refs.name: CSS Transitions
refs.description: The definition of 'TransitionEvent.pseudoElement' in CSS Transitions.
